item.title: Mastering Dart Book Review
item.description: Dart community is growing so much and many books about this wonderful web oriented language are borning. I read quite all of them and they all covered the basic of the language and the development platform. To go in depth to the full power of Dart we need to join the discussions all over the web ( G+ Dartisans Community, StackOverflow, Google Groups etc. ). “Mastering Dart” will help you to go beyond the “Hello world” code.
